LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_AimingDelay: aiming time and ranged cooldown multiplier
aiming time and ranged cooldown multiplier can be reduced by studying how to improve the responsiveness of colonists.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_ArmorRating: By studying how to increase the musculoskeletal density of the human body, improve the armor of the colonists.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_BloodFiltra: By studying the structure of the human body to improve the filtration, circulation, breathing and digestion of the colonists.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Consciousne: To enhance the consciousness of the colonists by studying the structure of the human body.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_GlobalLearn: By studying human brain structure, we can improve the global learning factor of the colonists
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_IncomingDam: Through research to improve the musculoskeletal density of human body, to reduce the incoming damage multiplier of human body
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Manipulatio: To enhance the manipulation of the colonists by studying the structure of the human body.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_MechBandwid: Improve mechanics' mech bandwidth by studying the structure of the human brain.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_MeditationF: To improve the meditation psyfocus gain of colonial residents by studying human brain structure.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_MeleeCooldo: Reduce the melee cooldown of the human body through research to improve human reflexes.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_MeleeDamage: By studying the muscle power efficiency of the human body, the melee damage factor of the colonists was increased
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Mood.label: mood
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Mood.descri: To improve the mood of the colonists by studying sociology and psychology.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_MoveSpeed.d: By studying the efficiency of muscle power in the human body, to increase the speed of movement of colonists.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Moving.desc: To enhance the moving of the colonists by studying the structure of the human body.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_Negotiation: By studying social knowledge, the negotiation ability and social impact of the colonists were improved.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_PsychicSens: By studying the structure of the human brain, to enhance the colonists' psychic sensitivity.
By studying the structure of the human brain to reduce the colonists' psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_SightHearin: By studying the structure of the human body, the colonists were able to see, hear, speak, and eat better.
LanguageData.ZeroTechRepeatableTechnology_WorkSpeedGl: To improve the global work speed of the colonists by studying the efficiency of muscle power in the human body.
By studying the structure of the human brain, to improve the mech work speed offset of mechanics
